message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it will be highly valuable to you.  I'm asking for $10,000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to make sure it's a good deal for me.

Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your perspective, the value of this product is truly significant. I'm willing to come down slightly to $9,000. This is a very fair offer considering its worth.

I understand that the product has value, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $7,500. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
